# thunder_ip_app_protocol_port_udp_port_add (Resource)

`thunder_ip_app_protocol_port_udp_port_add`: Add application port

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_ip_app_protocol_port_udp_port_add" "thunder_ip_app_protocol_port_udp_port_add" {
  app_name_list {
    name     = 62
    user_tag = "46"
    interface {
      management = 0
      ve_cfg {
        ve_start = 252
        ve_end   = 252
      }
      eth_cfg {
        ethernet_start = 2
        ethernet_end   = 2
      }
    }
  }
  port     = 54736
  user_tag = "105"
}
```
